objects.description: Track changes to critical service-related files (e.g., ```/etc/systemd/system/```, ```/etc/init.d/```, and service binaries on Linux, ```C:\Windows\System32\services.exe``` on Windows, or ```/Library/LaunchDaemons``` on macOS). Analytic 1 - Unusual file modifications related to system services. sourcetype=file_monitor | search file_path IN ("/etc/systemd/system/*", "/etc/init.d/*", "/Library/LaunchDaemons/*", "C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe")
